description: The PH-123V fluid video head with adjustable drag tension provide incredibly smooth pan and tilt functions and rigid magnesium, closed type construction for steady videography with HD camcorders and add-ons. Spring loaded, adjustable counter balance ensures perfect amount of balance for the weight of the camera being used. PH fluid video head features a large quick shoe safety release button and front-to-back movement, fine tuning capabilities for optimal center of gravity positioning.
title: VANGUARD PH-123V Tripod Head (Black)
